effect.short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
effect.full:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

Power is doubled against Pok√©mon that have used minimize since entering the field.

flavorTexts.text:
The user crushes its target by rolling over the target
with its rolled-up body. This may also make the
target flinch.

with its rolled-up body. This may also make the
target flinch.

over them with its rolled-up body.
This may also make the target flinch.
